verse:
उत्तिष्ठत जाग्रत प्राप्य वरान्निबोधत।
क्षुरस्य धारा निशिता दुरत्यया दुर्गं पथस्तत्कवयो वदन्ति ॥
meaning: Meaning:Arise, awaken and understand the highest attainments,For the path of overcoming mighty challenges is as sharp as a flowing sword,Wise thinkers speak of it as difficult to cross.

upanishad-org.meaning: Arise, awake, find out the great ones and learn of them: for sharp as a razor’s edge, hard to traverse, difficult of going is that path, say the sages.
